title: Client notified me that my account was logged into elsewhere
body:
Just now, I got a message from my LoL client that my account had been logged into from somewhere else:

"Your account has been logged in to from another computer. If this was unauthorized please visit the player support site at: https://support.riotgames.com"

I went to the site but couldn't find anything about this specific situation. I will change my password, but I don't know what to do other than that; my password is unique to LoL and is made up of all the usually recommended characters (lower and upper-case, numbers and symbols). I have never told anyone the password and I can't think how I could make it any more secure than it currently is.

I've made this thread to see ask if there are any bugs that could cause a false alarm. My password hasn't been changed, I haven't received any emails, my IP and RP are the same... It just doesn't seem like my account was actually accessed by someone else. I don't know at what level this error could have occurred, but it would be nice to be reassured that nothing is at risk.

replies.body: Just for your own safety I went ahead and looked over your account to see if there might have been any suspicious activity. It does look like somebody was able to somehow access your account without you knowing, so I'd suggest possibly updating your email password as well as reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure there wasn't any damage done in the process.
I didn't consider checking through the account team for damage, but I'll make sure to now. Thank you so much for taking the time to look into the issue.
